title: John Frieda Frizz Ease Beyond Smooth Frizz-Immunity Shampoo with Frizz-Immunity Conditioner, 8.45oz
description: John Frieda Coconut Oil Infused Frizz Ease Shampoo and Conditioner is formulated to build up your resistance to dry, damaged, frizzy hair while making it more manageable and easily styled. Fight frizz and flyaways before they start with John Frieda Frizz Ease Beyond Smooth Frizz-Immunity Shampoo and Conditioner. Repairs and moisturizes damaged, curly, frizzy and coarse hair types with our unique coconut oil infused formula. It penetrates hair fibers, working from the inside out to fight frizz, combats the porosity of dry, damaged hair and creates an internal barrier. When used with John Frieda Frizz Ease Beyond Smooth Frizz-Immunity Shampoo, hair becomes more frizz-resistant; over time and with continued use, its immunity to frizz gets stronger, so hair becomes smoother and more manageable. When used with John Frieda Frizz Ease Beyond Smooth Frizz-Immunity Conditioner, frizz is reduced up to 90%, and with continued use, the hairâ€™s immunity to frizz gets stronger. Infused with pure coconut oil, the shampoo gently cleanses, so hair looks and feels smooth, sleek, and healthy. Infused with coconut oil, the conditioner improves the texture of medium/thick wavy and curly hair types, so hair looks and feels smooth, sleek, and healthy. Protect against humidity and invest in the health of your wavy, curly or frizzy hair. Satisfaction Guaranteed
